org.jvnet.inflector.lang.en

Class NounPluralizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jvnet.inflector.RuleBasedPluralizer
      • org.jvnet.inflector.lang.en.NounPluralizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pluralizer

    public class NounPluralizer
extends RuleBasedPluralizer

    A Pluralizer for English nouns.

    Instances of this class are safe for multiple concurrent threads.

    This code is based on Lingua::EN::Inflect, which is Copyright (c) 1997-2000, Damian Conway.

    Author:
    Tom White

    • Method Detail

      • postProcess

        protected String postProcess(String trimmedWord,
                 String pluralizedWord)
        Description copied from class: RuleBasedPluralizer

        Apply processing to pluralizedWord. This implementation ensures the case of the plural is consistent with the case of the input word.

        If trimmedWord is all uppercase, then pluralizedWord is uppercased. If trimmedWord is titlecase, then pluralizedWord is titlecased.

        Overrides:
        postProcess in class RuleBasedPluralizer
        Parameters:
        trimmedWord - the input word, with leading and trailing whitespace removed
        pluralizedWord - the pluralized word
        Returns:
        the pluralizedWord after processing
